description:
deepl proのAPIを利用して、テキストの翻訳ができるプラグインです。ディープラーニングによる高精度な翻訳を手軽に利用可能です。

It is a plugin that can translate texts using deepl pro API. You can easily use highly accurate translation by deep learning.
name: DeepL Pro
plugin_instructions:
本プラグインの利用にあたり、DeepL Pro（DeepL APIプラン）の登録、およびDeepL Proの認証キーが必要です。

auth_keyに認証キーを入力し、target_lang、必要に応じてsource_langに下記の翻訳対象の言語のパラメーターを入力してください。

翻訳可能な言語は以下となります。

"DE" - German
"EN" - English
"FR" - French
"IT" - Italian
"JA" - Japanese
"ES" - Spanish
"NL" - Dutch
"PL" - Polish
"PT" - Portuguese
"RU" - Russian
"ZH" - Chinese

-In order to use this plug-in, DeepL Pro (DeepL API plan) registration and DeepL Pro authentication key are required.

Enter the authentication key in auth_key, and the target_lang and, if necessary, the following parameters of the target language for translation in source_lang.

The languages that can be translated are as follows.

"DE"-German
"EN"-English
"FR"-French
"IT"-Italian
"JA"-Japanese
"ES"-Spanish
"NL"-Dutch
"PL"-Polish
"PT"-Portuguese
"RU"-Russian
"ZH"-Chinese
